originalText.text:
I never make reviews but Marlene deserves an exception. I also never trust anyone with my hair (have been doing my own hair for a decade) but Marlene also deserves an exception with that. This woman is an artist - and and incredible one! She gave me the most beautiful, full of life bob. I keep getting so many compliments about it!
I will be going to her for absolutely everything hair related from now on. I can't believe I missed out on her talent for so long!!! Thank you so much Marlene for the most beautiful haircut ü§©

originalText.text: I love Marlene!! She has been doing my hair for years without fail. She is professional and friendly and completely talented with my curly hair. I always leave the chair feeling pretty and cool and ready for the world.

text.text: I love Marlene!! She has been doing my hair for years without fail. She is professional and friendly and completely talented with my curly hair. I always leave the chair feeling pretty and cool and ready for the world.

originalText.text:
I am so happy with my hair! I can honestly say that, every day, thanks to Marlene Flaton.

Marlene is a curly hair whisperer! For the first 40+ years of my life, I got my hair cut as infrequently as possible because it wd take weeks, sometimes over a month, for it to get back to itself after a cut.  And for me to feel fully comfortable with it.

But with Marlene, I leave her salon already loving my hair(something I never before believed possible:) and somehow, at every stage of growth, it continues to delight! And she manages this every time! That‚Äôs 9+years of great cuts (and counting:)

How does she do it? No idea, but I  feel so grateful and lucky that she doesüôèüèº üçÄ üòå

And‚Ä¶ she‚Äôs a genuinely wonderful person! (With an awesome playlist:)

So honestly, make an appointment. With all the challenges life brings, at least our hair can look fabulous.

originalText.text: Marlene is the perfect hair 'artist.' I had the best experience getting my curly hair cut and walked out of her salon beaming. She listened and delivered exactly what I wanted, paying attention to my facial structure and each curl. I'm a big believer in dry cutting, so if you are too, please check her out!

text.text: Marlene is the perfect hair 'artist.' I had the best experience getting my curly hair cut and walked out of her salon beaming. She listened and delivered exactly what I wanted, paying attention to my facial structure and each curl. I'm a big believer in dry cutting, so if you are too, please check her out!

originalText.text: Marlene is wonderful! I have been seeing her for my hair cuts for over 6yrs now, and will not let anyone else cut my hair. She is patient, easygoing, flexible and listens to your concerns/needs. She is conservative with cutting, and I have long hair which I am very sensitive about. She has never gone overboard or cut too much, and I always feel great after leaving the salon. She takes her time and never feels rushed. LOVE HER!
